org.xeustechnologies.jcl
Class AbstractClassLoader

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.ClassLoader
      org.xeustechnologies.jcl.AbstractClassLoader
Direct Known Subclasses:
JarClassLoader
public abstract class AbstractClassLoader
extends java.lang.ClassLoader

Abstract class loader that can load classes from different resources

Author:
Kamran Zafar

public java.lang.Class loadClass(java.lang.String className,
                                 boolean resolveIt)

getResourceAsStream

public java.io.InputStream getResourceAsStream(java.lang.String name)
Overrides the getResourceAsStream method to load non-class resources from other sources, JarClassLoader is the only subclass in this project that loads non-class resources from jar files

getResourceAsStream in class java.lang.ClassLoader
